text: int max ( int a , int b ) { if ( a < b ) return b ; else a ; } void main ( ) { int a [ 100 ] [ 100 ] , m [ 100 ] [ 100 ] , result [ 100 ] ; int i = 0 , j = 0 , n , m1 , k = 0 ; scanf ( "%d" , & m1 ) ; for ( k = 0 ; k < m1 ; k ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { j = 0 ; while ( j <= i ) { scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] [ j ] ) ; j ++ ; } } for ( j = 0 ; j < n ; j ++ ) { m [ n - 1 ] [ j ] = a [ n - 1 ] [ j ] ; } j = 0 ; i = n - 2 ; while ( i >= 0 ) { m [ i ] [ 0 ] = a [ i ] [ 0 ] + max ( m [ i + 1 ] [ 0 ] , m [ i + 1 ] [ 1 ] ) ; for ( j = 1 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) { m [ i ] [ j ] = max ( a [ i ] [ j ] + max ( m [ i + 1 ] [ j ] , m [ i + 1 ] [ j + 1 ] ) , m [ i + 1 ] [ j - 1 ] ) ; } i -- ; } result [ k ] = m [ 0 ] [ 0 ] ; } for ( k = 0 ; k < m1 ; k ++ ) { printf ( "%d\n" , result [ k ] ) ; } }
